Text: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
All praise is for Allah, the 'Rabb' of the Worlds.
Master of the Day of Judgment.
O'Allah!  You Alone we worship and You Alone we call on for help.
O'Allah! Guide us to The Right Way.
The Way of those whom You have favored;  not of those who have\n\t\t\tearned Your wrath, or of those who have lost The Way.
